title: Bug 5473: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces
description: Bug 5473: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.
OB: When the tab character is replaced with spaces in the first line so that both lines are visually indented the same, and ShiftLeft is executed, the text moves. However, it is confusing if there is a stray space because it is not clear why the text won't shift. In this scenario, it seems like the second line should be shifted left and the first line should be shifted left, at least to the space character (i.e., get rid of the tab).
